select
distinct
a.info_id, a.info_title,a.info_short_title,a.info_description,a.info_main_img, a.cls_id,a.show_index,a.scope,a.top_rank,a.open_related,b.author,b.content, (select group_concat(c.name) from litemall_tab_info_tag c ,litemall_tab_info_tag_related d where c.id=d.tag_id and d.info_id=a.info_id ) tag_name FROM litemall_tab_info a left join litemall_tab_info_content b on a.info_id=b.info_id order by a.info_id desc

from litemall_tab_info where info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and deleted =
1
